all() → list[Task]¶

ep_name = 'task'¶
filter(*args, **kwargs) → list[Task]¶

Attempt to use the filter options. Really only a single query

Keyword Arguments:

q (str) –

get(*args, **kwargs) → Task | None¶

Get single Record

Parameters:

  • *args (int) – (optional) id to retrieve. If this is not type(int) dump it into filter and grind it up there.

  • **kwargs (str) – (optional) see filter() for available filters

Examples

Get by ID

>>> fm.sm.centralsyslogs.get(12)
new york

Get by partial name. Case insensative.

>>> fm.sm.centralsyslogs.get(name='detro')
detroit

Keyword Arguments:

layout(task: str) → bool | dict | str | bytes¶

Retrieve a task layout.

Parameters:

task (str) –

FireMon-API is a Python web wrapper for the FireMon SIP (Security Mangager, etc...) APIs. The intent is make something that is useful for quick and easy development against FireMon products.
